doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 8/26/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 8/26/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, David Strah, Jim Levin and Mel Rosin, Director of the NY State AIDS Institute, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund 2.Discussion about how democrats Ed Koch and Governor Cuomo have dealt with the AIDS crisis.COMMERCIAL: Prevention campaign by SWISS-AIDS-ASSISTANCE3.Footage of "New York Post" AIDS Forum, August 6 at the Sheraton Hotel and discussion of New York City Mayor, Ed Koch's speech at the forumCOMMERCIAL: Human Rights Campaign Fund4. NYC Council Members and opponents of gay rights, Aileen Ryan and Thomas Cuite died, Gay rights activist Tom Doerr died5.Lavender Health, Interview with Dr. Harold Kooden of the Lesbian and Gay Mental Health Advisory Group 6.Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1.Naming Names, criticism of Senator Gordon Humphrey of New Hampshire who criticized Regan's appointment of Dr. Frank Lilly to his AIDS panelCOMMERCIAL: First Hand2.Media Watch, Interviews with Dan Sauso, Lisa Heft and Ron from The Names ProjectCOMMERCIAL: The Islanders Club 3.Show Bitz, discussion about Charles Bush's play, Psycho Beach Party4.Inside Out, discussion about "lightness" in commercial products.COMMERCIAL: Manscape5. Introduction of Lyle's Deck, a gay resort on South Padre Island, Texas
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 34 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 8/26/1987]: August 1987
